synopsis.text: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury's second season introduces viewers to the captivating opening theme "slash" by the talented artist yama. The official music video for this enthralling track is skillfully directed by Atsushi Tani, offering fans a visually stunning experience that complements the powerful tune. As the opening theme for the anime, "slash" sets the stage for the thrilling adventures that await in this highly anticipated installment of the Mobile Suit Gundam franchise.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
